description: Dashboard for the Cilium v1.12 (https://cilium.io/) Hubble metrics

targets.expr: sum(rate(hubble_icmp_total{family="IPv4", type="EchoRequest"}[1m])) by (pod) - sum(rate(hubble_icmp_total{family="IPv4", type="EchoReply"}[1m])) by (pod)
sum(rate(hubble_icmp_total{family="IPv6", type="EchoRequest"}[1m])) by (pod) - sum(rate(hubble_icmp_total{family="IPv6", type="EchoReply"}[1m])) by (pod)

panels.title: Top 10 Source Pods with Denied Packets
Top 10 Destination Pods with Denied Packets

targets.expr: sum(rate(hubble_dns_queries_total[1m])) by (pod, qtypes) - sum(rate(hubble_dns_responses_total[1m])) by (pod, qtypes)

title: Cilium v1.12 Hubble Metrics
